module.name: pygame2.sdl.wm
module.desc: Pygame SDL window manager wrapper module.

func.name: get_caption
func.desc: Gets the caption of the current pygame2.sdl window.

func.name: get_info
func.desc: Gets operating system and window manager specific information about the current pygame2.sdl window .

func.name: grab_input
func.desc: Advices the window manager to let the window grab the mouse and keyboard input focus (or release it). The function returns the previously set mode.

func.name: iconify_window
func.desc: Advices the window manager to iconify the window and returns, whether the operation was successful or not.

func.name: set_caption
func.desc: Sets the caption of the current pygame2.sdl window.

func.name: set_icon
func.desc: Sets window manager icon to be used by the window.

func.name: toggle_fullscreen
func.desc: Tries to toggle the fullscreen mode for the pygame2.sdl window and returns, whether the operation was successful or not.
